title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with Next.js and Stripe integration. Features include real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and an admin dashboard for analytics.

title: Task Management API
description: RESTful API for a task management system with authentication, real-time updates via WebSockets, and comprehensive testing coverage.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Interactive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, historical data visualization, and customizable alerts.

title: CLI Development Tools
description: Collection of command-line tools for developers including project scaffolding, git workflow automation, and productivity utilities.
